channel.title: Day 1 schedule on Complexity Methods for Behavioural Science
channel.description: Recent content in Day 1 schedule on Complexity Methods for Behavioural Science

item.title: Introduction to Complexity Science
item.description: Slides Download slide Literature Chapter II of Thelen & Ulrich (1991) provides a great overview of many of the topics discussed during the lecture. Thelen, E., & Ulrich, B. D. (1991). Hidden skills: A dynamic systems analysis of treadmill stepping during the first year. Monographs of the Society for Research in Child Devevelopment, 56(1), 1-98; discussion 99-104. Retrieved from https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/1922136

item.title: Assignments Mathemathics of Change
item.description: Slides Download slides Assignments Growth models and deterministic chaos EXTRA: Coupled systems

item.title: Introduction to the Mathematics of Change
item.description: Slides Download slide Literature Chapter 3 explains some of the basics of difference and differential equations. More detailed explanations can be found in Kaplan, D., & Glass, L. (2012). Understanding nonlinear dynamics. Springer Science & Business Media.
